subjects.name: Data Science
subjects.description: An all-encompassing guide to data science, from fundamentals to advanced applications.

topics.name: Introduction to Data Science
topics.description: Overview, importance, and lifecycle of data science projects.

topics.name: Programming for Data Science
topics.description: Python programming essentials for data science.

topics.name: Mathematics for Data Science
topics.description: Key math concepts: linear algebra, statistics, and calculus.

topics.name: Data Analysis and Manipulation
topics.description: Data wrangling, cleaning, and exploration with Python.

topics.name: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and Visualization
topics.description: Fundamentals of data visualization and descriptive statistics.

topics.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
topics.description: Basics of machine learning, types, and algorithms.

topics.name: Supervised Learning Techniques
topics.description: In-depth study of supervised learning methods.

topics.name: Unsupervised Learning Techniques
topics.description: Overview of clustering and dimensionality reduction.

topics.name: Advanced Machine Learning Techniques
topics.description: Ensemble learning, model optimization, and regularization.

topics.name: Introduction to Deep Learning
topics.description: Basics of neural networks and deep learning frameworks.

topics.name: Specialized Deep Learning Models
topics.description: Advanced models: CNNs, RNNs, and GANs.

topics.name: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
topics.description: Text processing and NLP techniques.

topics.name: Time Series Analysis
topics.description: Analysis and forecasting of time series data.

topics.name: Data Engineering Fundamentals
topics.description: Data management, ETL processes, and big data tools.

topics.name: Model Deployment and Maintenance
topics.description: Deploy models using Flask, Docker, and cloud platforms.

topics.name: Ethics and Fairness in Data Science
topics.description: Ethical considerations, bias, and fairness in AI.

topics.name: Practical Data Science Projects
topics.description: Hands-on projects and real-world case studies.

topics.name: Data Privacy and Security
topics.description: Protecting data and ensuring privacy.

topics.name: Feature Engineering
topics.description: Techniques for creating effective features.

topics.name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
topics.description: Using cloud services for data science.

topics.name: Big Data Analytics
topics.description: Analysis of large-scale data using Hadoop and Spark.

topics.name: Data Science Tools and Platforms
topics.description: Overview of tools like Jupyter, RStudio, and Apache Spark.
